page.title: 10SHOPS
page.content: Forest Town is a town near Mansfield. There are a lot of shops where we live. On Violet Hill there is a tool hire called C.P.M. Tool Hire. It hires out tractors, diggers and caterpillars. Up the road is a Hyper market called Tesco a hypermarket is a supermarket with its own car park. There is a Garden Centre at Tesco. Down the road from Tesco is Bob Richards fitted furniture and kitchens. Also in Forest Town there is a carpet shop which sells carpets, mats and rugs. Next to that is a fish and chips shop where you can buy fish, chips and peas. There are two paper shops and one buiding society and one chemist. The chemist sells cough sweets and health bars. {RICHARD GREAVES, JULIAN KINGSWOOD {
